title: Tune Spotter
contents: Discover nearby live music events with personalized notifications.

title: CodeQuest Challenge
contents: Embark on a daily journey of tech puzzles covering coding, sybersecurity, and database realms.

title: Goal Guardian
contents: Maneuver a soccer ball through a series of intricate obstacles, showcasing your dribbling skills and agility in this thrilling soccer-themed game for Windows and macOS.
